page.title: 07DUNDONALD _ LEISURE
page.content: {THE MEN'S CLUB _} The Men's Club is held on Thursday evenings from September to March.It meets at 7.30pm till 10.00pm in the Church Hall.The men play 'bias bowls' and 'straight bowls'.There are about 20 members who pay 20 pence each night and receive a cup of tea and a biscuit. {THE YOUNG WOMEN'S GROUP _ The Young Women's Group meets every second Monday in the Church Hall at 7.30pm till about 9.30pm.They have talks,demonstrations,social nights and games.They also sometimes go on outings.At the end of the year they have a children's party and a Christmas Dance for the adults which they all enjoy.
